website_summaries.verdict: The Google Pixel C is the best Android tablet money can buy.
pros: The Google Pixel C has a slim, compact aluminum build that feels sturdy
Its optional Bluetooth keyboard is equally solid and doubles as the tablet's cover and it has a powerful, long-running battery
The tablet runs the latest version of Android and its performance is lightning fast
The screen is sharp, bright and colorful, and gaming graphics look stellar
cons: It's a bit heavy when attached to the keyboard (which is sold separately)
Big-name apps and games still tend to hit iOS before Android

customer_reviews.title: Unusable
customer_reviews.text: This is such a beautiful device but Android 9 just renders this tablet useless. It really slows it down. Buy an iPad instead.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Calvert

customer_reviews.title: fast enough to browse the web, terrific device.
customer_reviews.text: this tablet is terrific. It’s the first android tablet I’ve use that as fast enough to browse the web without having to wait forever for pages to load and flash to run and trackers to track and spyware to spy. Beautiful display mix reading e-books and such a breeze. This is a very, very high-quality device. I was able to buy it for about half the retail price by getting it used. It was in mint condition.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Kuykendall

customer_reviews.title: default device on road trips.
customer_reviews.text: It's lighter than I expected and boots up quickly easiest way to read books especially if using split screen and great battery life for movies.
customer_reviews.author: zune ipod NO ZEN

customer_reviews.title: Dope!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quicker than anticipated, and is by far one of the best tablets I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: This tech is impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister, however being the tech person here, I set it up for her. What an efficient OS Google developed for this tablet. If my Xperia Z4 dies, I am going to get one of these.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love using this tablet. Perfect for Android fans. Reduced 1 star to improve the software.
customer_reviews.author: Jahafer Sadikh

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the item for my son for his school work and he's happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: BEST GOODMAN

customer_reviews.title: For me the best android tablet 2016
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tablet. Battey, Size, and screen Resultion After Nexus 9 & Galaxy Tab S2 9.7 Pixel C for me the best android tablet Only one thing no fingerprint
customer_reviews.author: IBRAHIM Y

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY. Touchscreen doesn't work after 1 yr ...
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. Touchscreen doesn't work after 1 yr 1 month of occasional use. This issue just happened right after the warranty expired how convenient for Google. What a piece of junk. Just do a search for PIXEL C TOUCHSCREEN NOT WORKING it's a common problem. I will never buy a Google product again. This is also happening on their brand new phones.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan M. Johns

customer_reviews.title: and best of all
customer_reviews.text: Fast, laden with ability, and best of all, it's NOT an Apple product! Apple products are inferior, disgustingly overpriced, and marketed to conformist sheeple who believe they are "thinking different." Remember when owning an Apple supposedly meant you were a free-thinking, progressively-minded person casting a sledgehammer at Big Brother, i.e. IBM? LOL! How the wheel spins! Now Jobs is regarded as a genius whose posthumous autobiography is regarded as canon by the Apple-faithful. In reality he was a charlatan thief who was, at best, a leech. At worst, he can be realistically regarded as a megalomaniacal self-absorbed fanatic. Oh yeah, go Google! ;o) My wife loves her new tablet!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Design Flaw in Screen
customer_reviews.text: This was an amazing tablet until the screen failed after a year of use (google half-screen failure). Happily, Google replaced the unit and sent me a replacement. Well that was a year ago and it just happened again! Now (January 2019) the unit is not supported by Google and their service rep tells me the parts are no longer in production. So I'm stranded with a worthless piece of electronics I can't use. I didn't buy a premium tablet with the expectation I'd be forced to throw it away in less than 2 years!
customer_reviews.author: Weekend Photographer

customer_reviews.title: Lousy warranty protection
customer_reviews.text: It lost its password after about 8 months use, and the only way to recover was with a factory reset. Then it happened again about six months later, and even factory reset wouldn't work due to a completely missing boot sector. Now Google are refusing to honour the warranty, claiming that it's a hardware failure out of warranty, completely ignoring the fact that it failed first under warranty.. That's the last google device I ever buy. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Limey Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Pixel C Failures...Zero Stars
customer_reviews.text: If I could give zero stars for Google's Pixel C I would. First Pixel C from Google was DOA. Brand new Pixel C would flash Google logo and turn off. Now my Pixel C has a "No Command" and is completely failed after a Google Update. Google Support says I'm out of luck, will not send a replacement. Extremely disappointed with faulty Google hardware and their lack of support for customers. So with Google OS (Android) and Google Pixel hardware I've had a 100% failure rate.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Allen

customer_reviews.title: great while it lasts
customer_reviews.text: suffered the same touch screen issue as everyone else. to everyone who has suffered the touch screen issue we should get together and pull a class action.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Tablet!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this tablet! If you on the fence about getting it, you should get it! You'll be very pleased! I own a iPad Air2 as well and this has a iPad build quality but maybe better and the Pixel C always runs the newest version of Android! I can't express how much I love this tablet, I love Android but there has never been a Android tablet that can compare to Apples build quality until the Pixel C!!! Top specs in a beautiful package!!!
customer_reviews.author: dandroidos

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy This Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of Google and Android, but this tablet stinks. I went through 3 of them in a year and a half, and Google will not replace it again. Please do not ignore the reviews. This tablet has all kinds of problems.
customer_reviews.author: Nukeroot

customer_reviews.title: Good for the first look, but failed in the long run
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a pixel C 32 GB a year ago. Since than the tablet WENT WRONG 3 times! The problem was with the display all 3 times: it didn't respond or didn't refresh correctly. I also had problems with the wifi connection, it disconnects sometimes and not stable. I just had to send it back all 3 times and they replaced it, but it is NOT a stable device in my opinion. If you want a ready-to-use tablet DO NOT buy this one, it will broke in 3-4 months. I won't buy first generation products in the future :(.
customer_reviews.author: Felicián Benda

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy at this price!!!! 64gb version available from google store for 499.00. Great tablet though.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Primemium machine hampered by bad software and questionable business practices
customer_reviews.text: The Pixel C suffers from Wi-Fi problems. Google has known about this since the beginning of the year. I ordered a replacement machine and it has same problem. Google is now dragging its feet on issuing a full refund. They have no solution for the problem. Buyer Beware!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Neidlinger

customer_reviews.title: This is the best Talley I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Obviously but it on the Google site for much cheaper. This is the best Talley I've ever owned. So unbelievably far and incredible build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Wilkinson
